message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper is about automated classification of requirements written in natural language, which is a task in requirements engineering. This falls under the sub-category of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses machine learning approaches such as Latent Dirichlet Allocation, Biterm Topic Modeling, and Naive Bayes, which are commonly used in natural language processing (NLP) and text classification. Therefore, the paper could also belong to the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
